Name: Paint Drying Simulator
About the game: We made this game so you can experience the thrill of watching your favorite color of paint dry, and what better than take the time to enjoy it like you would in real life, for 6 hours, but wait!! ..this is way less expensive and you can do it as much as you want, bet your old wall can't do that am I right? XD
